title: Making  a Ranked 5's Team-
body:
I'm interested in making a ranked 5's team who is able to play with each other constantly and get better. (Sick of playing 2 or 3 games with a team and then never hearing from them again).  

I don't really care what rank you are honestly it does not matter as long as your willing to learn from your teams like i intend to. 
Looking for a 
Support-
ADC-
TOP-

I will be playing jungle, and a friend of mine will be the mid laner from the team we are both around mid gold.

Feel free to add me in game if you are interested in making a team with me. As for the name i'm currently undecided any ideas are much appreciated.

replies.body: Hi although I am only bronze my mmr makes me normally play silvers and golds because I have 10/10 wins with lissandra top and also enjoy j4 and riven top {{champion:127}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:92}}

Hey, i main support.
Usually these champs - {{champion:25}}  {{champion:89}} {{champion:37}} {{champion:117}} 
My main is on another server, so yeah that's why i'm currently 'unranked' here.

If you're still looking for members :)

Currently plat 4
ADC main - {{champion:222}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:18}} {{champion:236}}  are my main pool however I frequently practice all other champs and roles
I have all voice communication programs and am more than happy to use them if needed

I also have a very strong top and mid lane if needing to fill.

Top

Got a pretty good champ pool.
silver 1 supp main add me yo

(Sick of playing 2 or 3 games with a team and then never hearing from them again). 

same.
